title: Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags, 13 Gallon, Unscented, 50 Count
descriptions:
Introducing the Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags! These high-quality trash bags are designed to make your daily cleaning routine a breeze.

- Product Name: Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags
- Quantity: 50 bags per pack
- Scent: Unscented
- Capacity: 13 Gallons
- Material: Tear-resistant white plastic
- Strength: Flex-tra strength for added durability
- Closure Type: Red drawstring closure for easy tying and carrying
- Alexa Voice Shopping compatible for convenient ordering

With a pack of 50 bags, you'll always have enough to keep your kitchen clean and organized. The unscented design ensures that unpleasant odors are contained, making these bags perfect for any space.

These trash bags have a generous capacity of 13 gallons, allowing you to dispose of a significant amount of waste without worrying about leaks or tears. They are made from tear-resistant white plastic, ensuring that they can handle even the heaviest loads.

The Flex-tra strength of these trash bags provides extra durability, preventing rips and tears. You can confidently dispose of sharp objects or bulky waste without fear of the bag breaking.

The red drawstring closure makes it easy to tie and carry the bags, ensuring a mess-free disposal process. Simply pull the drawstring tight, and you're ready to go!

For added convenience, these trash bags are compatible with Alexa Voice Shopping. You can easily reorder whenever you're running low on supplies, making sure you never run out.

Upgrade your kitchen cleanup routine with the reliable and efficient Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags. Order yours today and experience the difference!
